title: Mother's Day, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump, declaring May 11, 2025, as Mother's Day in the United States. It emphasizes the vital role of mothers in shaping families and communities, acknowledging their unconditional love and support. The proclamation highlights the administration's commitment to empowering mothers and families, including defending the child tax credit, supporting at-risk pregnancies, and making fertility treatments more affordable. It calls for honoring all maternal figures and recognizing their contributions to society. The proclamation serves to encourage Americans to express their gratitude and reflect on the importance of motherhood for the nation's prosperity.
